com.fmph.kai.camera

Class Capture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fmph.kai.camera.Capture

  • public class Capture
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the camera capturing process.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Capture.CaptureException
      Custom exception for this class only.
      static interface  Capture.OnFrameReceived
      Allows to define the actions performed after a new frame from the camera was received.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Capture()
      Initializes the OpenCV VideoCapture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableCameras()
      Runs the Python script to get the cameras available on the PC.
      boolean isCapturing()
      Tells if the capture is on or off.
      static javafx.scene.image.Image Mat2Image(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Converts the OpenCV matrix into the JavaFX Image.
      void setOnFrameReceived(Capture.OnFrameReceived onFrameReceived)
      Sets the callback function invoked after a frame from the camera was received.
      void start(int cameraIndex)
      Starts the capturing process with the camera index specified.
      void stop()
      Stops the capturing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Capture

        public Capture()
        Initializes the OpenCV VideoCapture.

    • Method Detail

      • isCapturing

        public boolean isCapturing()
        Tells if the capture is on or off.
        Returns:
        true if capturing now, else false

      • setOnFrameReceived

        public void setOnFrameReceived(Capture.OnFrameReceived onFrameReceived)
        Sets the callback function invoked after a frame from the camera was received.
        Parameters:
        onFrameReceived - the callback function

      • start

        public void start(int cameraIndex)
           throws Capture.CaptureException
        Starts the capturing process with the camera index specified.
        Parameters:
        cameraIndex - the index of the camera to start capture with
        Throws:
        Capture.CaptureException - if the capture has been already started or failed to open the camera

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws Capture.CaptureException
        Stops the capturing.
        Throws:
        Capture.CaptureException - if the capture hasn't been started

      • Mat2Image

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image Mat2Image(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Converts the OpenCV matrix into the JavaFX Image.
        Parameters:
        frame - the matrix
        Returns:
        the converted image
        See Also:
        Mat, Image

      • getAvailableCameras

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableCameras()
                                                                                throws Capture.CaptureException
        Runs the Python script to get the cameras available on the PC.
        Returns:
        the list with camera indexes
        Throws:
        Capture.CaptureException - if the Python script has failed
